concept.title: 5333.170 Briefing Requirement for Protested Acquisitions Valued at $1B or More

conbody.p:
Within seven (7) days of the filing of the protest, forward the briefing slide deck through the SCO to AFLOA/JAQ and to SAF/AQC
for review and processing to OUSD(A&S)/DPC.
